TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content: I JUST had my first problem navigating to the page.
Forums just stopped working for me again; do we know what causes this problem, or is it just random?

Okay people, after extensive working, I\'ve moved all of the important forum threads to an SMF forum at

krp.net78.net

I will not be deleting the Vanilla forum until 2 weeks from now, to give everyone a chance to recover their things and move it to the new RP forum.

Also, we\'ve been through 5 RP forums (on my end, at least) so far. There were also 5 major Windows versions prior to Windows XP (3, 95, 98, ME, 2000). So, here\'s to hoping this is our XP (successful, stable.).
Okay, I registered. I like this style more than the Vanilla one anyways, it feels familiar since it\'s the same as the main forums are. Here\'s to hoping this one\'ll stick.
Bad luck? If things persist, I will make a forum in case.
If this actually is following the Windows development cycle, we do not need a Vista on our hands.
hey, just saying this now, I\'m probably not going to be in the RP until at most sunday. the reason being is that my birthday is coming up, i\'m at my mothers, etc. it\'s hetic
both site do not have the test on them ;P

> 
> both site do not have the test on them ;P

You still have to *do it*.

No amount of rasperrying will get you out of that.

> 
> You still have to *do it*.
> 
> No amount of rasperrying will get you out of that.

Just PM\'ed him the test. So if he says he doesn\'t have it, I have a receipt copy of it.

> 
> I can\'t get back to the old forums, can someone copy my (Kallifrey\'s) nation page and paste it in a PM to me?

Never mind, got it.

Well, since it looks like my land\'s been taken and I won\'t be exempt from the test despite being one of the first and most stable roleplayers, I\'m out. Too busy with other things anyway, so it\'s not much of a loss. You guys have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I think all the science talk has robbed people here of a sense of humour.

It\'s called Technobabble, damn it!

> 
> Well, since it looks like my land\'s been taken and I won\'t be exempt from the test despite being one of the first and most stable roleplayers, I\'m out. Too busy with other things anyway, so it\'s not much of a loss. You guys have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I\'d recommend Radion to overlook you due to the trust you at least have with me from the time of the RP.

I also hold some of your land, if you came here and became a grand-duke of it, we could find a way to invade and annex 50% of mincespy\'s weird claim.

(That would create some fun right off the bat)
Actually, yeah, I could go for being a vassal. Less demanding but still fun. PM me with some more details?

Okay, if you cannot access the forum, here\'s why - 

Server #11 is under the DDOS attack (IP Nullrouted)

We have just received a HUGE (over 3GB/s incoming traffic) DDoS attack targeting the Server #11. Our CISCO guard firewall was unable to handle such attack, so one of the server IP address - [Redacted] was disabled (all the rest websites on this server are working fine).

If your website is using this IP (due to unique IP rotation system only 3% websites are using this IP) it will be unavailable for the next 6 hours. As soon attack will subside, this IP address will be enabled and your website will start working again. We thank you for your patience and understanding.

- From my member\'s page on my host\'s website over the krp.net78.net control panel. So, please do not panic.

We got unlucky.

Edit: thought there were multiple IPs. Changed to plural.

I can\'t seem to point out a motive for this.

Nevertheless, you now have time to update the map and other things.

(Let\'s take this as a massive pirate raid, shall we?)
Oh well. Back to drawing war maps, I guess. At least my civilian improvement project will be done by then!
At least we didn\'t manage to overwhelm it ourselves this time; this really does to be a much better site than the others, apart from the random botnet attacks.
My colony will be nearly done by the time this cycles around.
Wait, has the RP actually started and stuff? Or is everyone just settling in..

> 
> Wait, has the RP actually started and stuff? Or is everyone just settling in..

Well, war almost broke out, multiple times.

Nukes are being built.

Everybody is colonizing something.

Space race is on.

So... yup.

Just so I can post the video without waiting 6 hours. Here is the Eceron I launch video - 

> [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=brl1FpIoPxM&feature=youtu.be](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=brl1FpIoPxM&feature=youtu.be)

It\'ll be done processing in a couple of minutes.

> 
> Well, war almost broke out, multiple times.
> 
> Nukes are being built.
> 
> Everybody is colonizing something.
> 
> Space race is on.
> 
> So... yup.

OH BAWLS.
Eh, I\'m missin\' it all! Who wants to run Makavi for a bit? Or can it just go dormant?
